fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.ddeployment_cs

Class CVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.CVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class CVM
extends AbstractCVM
    The class CVM creates a component assembly for the single-JVM execution of the dynamic deployment example.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2014-05-12

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      void deploy()
